channel.title: Pages on What's up, yyxunn?

item.title: About me
item.author: yyxun@outlook.com (yyxunn)
item.description: I have always struggled with how to introduce myself, constantly feeling confused by the question, “What kind of person am I?” This uncertainty has also extended to two other profound inquiries: “What kind of person do I aspire to be?” and “What truly constitutes the real world?” It’s possible that I will be entangled in these three questions for the rest of my life. There’s a Chinese proverb, “朝闻道，夕可死矣,” which holds two interpretations.
